page.title: 13Kirkconnel:Traditions cont.
page.content: On December 31 most people stay up until after mid-night to see in the New Year.On Auld Year's {Nicht}or Hogmanay most houses will be given a thorough cleaning and just before mid-night people will have a wash and change into clean clothes. This is so that nothing of the old year will be carried into the new. The New Year is toasted and the arrival of the first of,hopefully many visitors --the First Foot, is eagerly awaited.It is supposed to be lucky if the First Foot is tall,dark and handsome.He should bare a gift of a piece of coal,black bun or short-bread and also offer his host a drink with which to toast the new year.This first drink......usually alcoholic and more often than not whisky is called, locally,the New'r Day since it is on new year's first day. {Nicht}=night
